name: Clock Tower (itch) (Roxra)
description:
In this game, you must protect the clock from the environmental dangers such as meteors, lightning and even humans! You can place the clock anywhere along with the wood, stone and brass that protects it. How long will your clock tower last? 

Use your mouse to click an object and move it to the field. You have 100 days to build a tower to defend a clock which the player can place at any point. Building objects costs time so think wisely! After your days are over and clock has been placed, you must wait for your inevitable defeat! 

Built for a University Game Jam with a team of two other developers within a time limit of 2 days!

William Hughes (Roxra) - Programming/Design - roxra.github.io

Daniel King - Art

Ryan Masson - Design
